article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $9 Million to Continue Developing Navy Common Network Interface
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems has been awarded a $9.2 million contract with the U.S. Navy to continue developing the common network interface (CNI) system, a software package that improves situational awareness for expeditionary strike group (ESG) commanders. The contract could be worth up to $28.9 million if all options are exercised.
